author: andschwa
body: We know this works, but we should have a Pester test that executes a `#!/usr/bin/env powershell` script on Linux and asserts that it worked properly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We have a shebang test [here](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/test/shebang) but it's not run automatically.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @ealexjordan this is tied to the bug you're fixing in #1103, I'm going to assign this to you as you'll probably need to add these tests anyway.

title: Test PowerShell as interpreter on Linux
